name: Get that paper
description:
This is a game I made in scratch!

All the voices you hear are from friends of mine, they saw me making it and wanted to be a part of it so they did some funny sounds

Controller Instructions: a/b to jump and x/y to interact. You can also press start to skip the intro, start the game, and pause

Keyboard Instructions-

Press F to Interact with Stuff (The red screens allow you to switch characters)

Press 0 to toggle the level editor

while in the editor 1-9 keys toggle through different blocks to use

Pressing L while in the editor allows you to load a new level

Pressing R while in the editor resets the entire level

Press C while in the editor to show your level code and enter level codes!

Tags-

Credits-

Thanks to Griffpatch for the tile-based platformer tutorial!

Music made by 8bitJackie! Go check them out on Newgrounds!: Intro song: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/1145269

2D Pixel Art Scientist Sprites by Elthen on itch.io! https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-scientist-sprites
